name: Down in the Dungeon (Jaybee)
description:
It's December, 1995. Experience the sights, sounds, and musty smells of a ranch-house basement in the American South. Relive an accurate reconstruction of my childhood surrounded by wood panels and dead technology. Scan the channels on the tube TV, check out some vinyl records, and maybe pet my dog Max (rest in peace, boy). The most accurate and stimulating video game about walking around a basement ever created!   

Originally released for the Madvent Calendar 2020.

WISHLIST Still Ridge
